@area4689 you need ofw 3.55 or below to install any kind of custom firmware if you are above 3.55 then you need to downgrade by various hardware methods available but not all ps3's can be downgraded you will have to check if yours can be downgraded.

If you are on OFW 4.30 you need to pay a modder to downgrade your console to 3.55. Then you can install this CFW.

Modding costs between $30-$80 depending where you live. The price of a game or two... damn well worth it. 

Reliable modders with good references can easily be found on ps3hax psx-scene ps3iso and other forums.
US$60 tops or 35 GBP or 50 EUR
